UserPoint.EXPORT_FIELDS: RTRIM(LTRIM(targetUserIds.user_id)) user_id, ISNULL(UserPoint_CTE.point, 0) point, ISNULL(UserPoint_CTE.point_temp, 0) point_temp, CASE WHEN CONVERT(DATETIME, UserPoint_CTE.point_exp) < CONVERT(DATETIME, GETDATE()) THEN '' ELSE ISNULL( CONVERT(NVARCHAR, FORMAT(UserPoint_CTE.point_exp, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')), CONVERT(NVARCHAR, FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyyy-MM-dd') + ' 23:59:59')) END AS point_exp
